phrs.translation: 狐猴, 狐猴属, 奥索卡, 播放器
叉斑鼠狐猴属, 叉斑鼠狐猴, 叉斑鼠狐猴亚科
环尾狐猴, 节尾狐猴

sentences.sentence: Want observations describing the nocturnal behavior of the flying lemur?
sentences.translation: 想观看飞狐猴的夜间行为吗？

sentences.sentence: "It would have been quite an expensive lemur, " he told the Guardian at the time.
sentences.translation: “它将是一只十分昂贵的狐猴。”那时他告诉《卫报》说。

sentences.sentence: These include nearly 100 species of lemur, six of which are deemed critically endangered.
sentences.translation: 这些包括近100个狐猴物种，其中六种被认为属于严重濒危物种。
